title: Govinda
typeOfFood: Lacto, Chinese, Indian, Fast food, Take-out
description: Lacto-vegetarian restaurant, with vegan options. Cuisine is mainly Mauritian-adapted Indian cooking with Chinese and Italian preparations available on occasion. Eggless birthday cakes can also be ordered. Located near Phoenix Les Halles and Jumbo Phoenix shopping malls.
streetAddress: Hare Krishna Land, Srila Prabhupada Street, Pont Fer, Vacoas-Phoenix
